programme.title: The Brit Awards 2022
programme.desc: The highest profile music awards ceremony in the UK took place at the O2 Arena, with Adele sweeping up 3 major awards. With performances by celebrities like Dave and Ed Sheeran.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S7
programme.desc: It's Pastry Day and the remaining bakers from the first heat make patisserie in the shape of Harry Hill, and transform their favourite takeaway into a pie filling. Who will make it to Finals Week?

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: The summer solstice impacts Asian animals, driving Vietnamese macaques into the cool water, making cranes dance on the chilly Tibetan plateau, and inspiring one weird fish to go for a walk.

programme.title: Chef Next Door
programme.desc: Chef Jonas shares the easiest and most practical ways to cook restaurant recipes, some tricks of the trade and chef hacks that he has learned over ten years of working inside a professional kitchen. Each episode teaches viewers how to come up with restaurant quality output from modern urban limitation. Be prepared to see how he bounces back from kitchen struggles like lack of time and budget.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking And Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie brings us his most ingenious, delicious ways to use up those kitchen cupboard staples and back-of-the- freezer forgotten finds. He teaches us how to make great use of what we already have in our fridges and cupboards, and where we can make swaps in recipes when we have missing ingredients. More pragmatic and enjoyable than ever, Jamie demonstrates simple ways to make surprisingly delicious meals out of pantry classics.

programme.title: Mat Yoyo: The New Generation
programme.desc: Kim, Yoyo and Yaya talk about what it means to have a hobby and why it is good to have one. Kim then tells them that one of her hobbies is origami, and she teaches them how to make an origami cat. Why segment - Why does Yaya like to collect stickers? Yaya shares her love for collecting stickers and why she finds the hobby interesting. Kim, Yoyo and Yaya then discuss what other things people can collect as their hobbies.

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C
programme.desc: CLUB M.A.G.I.C celebrates great health today and Miss P takes the opportunity to get her agents to find out more about exercise - which is the best way to keep our bodies happy, healthy and strong. The LETTER OF THE DAY is 'q' and the words are quilt, quiche and queen.

programme.title: Kit n Kate S1
programme.desc: Two small kitties named Kit and Kate love their toy box. As soon as they hop inside, magic starts to happen. Kid's imagination transforms their room into a blueberry island, race track or a medieval castle. Every time the kitties create a whole new world with amazing discoveries, surprises and not-so-easy-to-solve dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fixies S3
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: MeteoHeroes S1
programme.desc: Fulmen, Nix, Nubes, Pluvia, Thermo and Ventum are six children who discover they have superpowers that involve weather phenomena. They also learn how they can use these to affect nature. Guided by CEM and the AI character Tempus they soon learn how to control their powers and use them wisely to solve small and big issues throughout our planet. On their way to becoming superheroes the kids will also face other dynamics that are typical of their age such as friendship, relations with elders etc.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger S4 Spinoff

programme.desc: A mysterious tech entrepreneur, Pixel Hunter arrives offering cutting-edge solutions to the park's security problems. Rara and gang, however, are thoroughly enjoying the perks of having their very own service droids. Meanwhile, Meep goes on a solo mission to uncover the identity of the mystery beast. The poacher strikes again and this time the white tiger is heisted from the Wildlife Park, and in a dramatic reveal, we learn the poacher is working for Pixel Hunter!

programme.title: 世界第一等 S13
programme.desc: 来摩洛哥，另一盎特色活动，就是买化石，当然，一般观众对于化石印象，可能是博物馆的巨大恐龙化石，但是在摩洛哥，走进撒哈拉沙漠，随处可见各式动物的小化石，不少当地人甚至直接贩售。所以对不少化石迷而言，买个小化石回家做纪念，绝对是只有在摩洛哥，才办的到的事! 当地人以摩洛哥茶、藏红花为原料，挥毫数笔后，以火烫纸背，此时图画渐现，颇有武侠小说里「燃火字现」的神妙。藏红花也叫番红花、西红花，是著名的珍贵中药材，主要药用部分为小小的柱头，因此显得十分珍贵.

programme.desc: (PG)(重) 在新加坡这个小岛上，每五段婚姻当中，就有一段是异族婚姻。不过，之前发生的一些事，似乎还隐藏着食古不化的态度。许多人或许会觉得纳闷，这种明目张胆的种族主义，怎么还会存在于今天的新加坡社会？几十年来精心培育的种族和谐，只不过是带着掩饰的宽容？我们试图从几对异族夫妻身上，寻找答案。.
